head.title: COVID-19 Avoyelles Parish School System Enrichment Instructional Resources and Guidance ‚Äì Curriculum & Instruction ‚Äì Avoyelles Parish School Board

meta.name: description
meta.content: Avoyelles Parish School Board has 10 schools in its district in Marksville, LA.

img.h1: COVID-19 Avoyelles Parish School System Enrichment Instructional Resources and Guidance

p.style: color: #515151; font-size: 14px; font-family: Montserrat; text-align: left; padding: 0px; margin: 0px

div.p: In lieu of a distance education program, the district is providing optional enrichment instructional resources that can be utilized to supportstudent learning at home. These resources are available for students in grades Pre-K through 12. The resources span core content areas ‚Äì ELA, math, science and social studies.

p.style: color: #515151; font-size: 14px; font-family: Montserrat; text-align: left; padding: 0px; margin: 0px

ul.li: APSB Website ‚Äì APSB has created a one-stop shop for students, parents, and educators to locate quality resources to continue learning enrichment at home.

Louisiana Department of Education ‚Äì The Avoyelles Parish School System will provide updates on resources released by the Louisiana Department of Education. These resources will be developed by the department in partnership with Louisiana Public Broadcasting (LPB). The online hub is set to launch on March 18th and will consist of links to High-Quality Curriculum Resources.

p.style: color: #515151; font-size: 14px; font-family: Montserrat; text-align: left; padding: 0px; margin: 0px

div.p: Dual Enrollment Courses:¬†Individual schools will be working with their teams to address options for Dual Enrollment courses based on guidance received from our local colleges and universities.

tr.td: Reading time with a parent or independently.

p.style: color: #515151; font-size: 14px; font-family: Montserrat; text-align: left; padding: 0px; margin: 0px
p.em: *To access resources, click directly on the green text.

color: #515151; font-size: 14px; font-family: Montserrat; text-align: left; padding: 0px; margin: 0px

div.p: Several programs are available to offer tips and resources for families that support early learning through text messages. Message and data rates apply.

p.style: font-size: 14px; padding: 0px; margin: 0px
font-size: 14px; padding: 0px; margin: 0px

li.p: Provides quality information and trusted resources to families of children prenatal to age eight partnering with LPB. Text: LPB to 274448.

p.style: font-size: 14px; padding: 0px; margin: 0px
font-size: 14px; padding: 0px; margin: 0px

li.p: Offers free, easy-to-use learning tips for children 5 and under, delivered daily directly to your phone. Sign up for free at¬†https://www.vroom.org/.

p.style: font-size: 14px; padding: 0px; margin: 0px
font-size: 14px; padding: 0px; margin: 0px

li.p: An evidence-based family engagement curriculum delivered via text messages. Text: Readby4th to 70138.

p.style: color: #515151; font-size: 14px; font-family: Montserrat; text-align: left; padding: 0px; margin: 0px
color: #515151; font-size: 14px; font-family: Montserrat; text-align: left; padding: 0px; margin: 0px

div.p:
Online Learning
Frog Street‚Äôs partner, Education technology provider Age of Learning, is offering families at schools and centers affected by closure free at-home access to research-proven learning resources.

p.style: font-size: 14px; padding: 0px; margin: 0px
font-size: 14px; padding: 0px; margin: 0px

li.p: A comprehensive, research-validated curriculum. Visit¬†www.ABCmouse.com/redeem¬†and redeem your access code.

p.style: font-size: 14px; padding: 0px; margin: 0px
font-size: 14px; padding: 0px; margin: 0px

li.p: A digital library and literacy platform designed by reading experts to improve literacy skills. Visit¬†www.ReadingIQ.com/redeem¬† and redeem your access code.

p.style: color: #515151; font-size: 14px; font-family: Montserrat; text-align: left; padding: 0px; margin: 0px
p.strong: Families can use the redeem code: SCHOOL3673 to sign up

p.strong: Parent Reference for Enrichment Instructional Resources

p.style: color: #515151; font-size: 14px; font-family: Montserrat; text-align: left; padding: 0px; margin: 0px

table.style: color: #515151; font-family: Montserrat; text-align: left; height: 1735px; width: 0px

tr.td:
BrainPOP offers cross-curricular movies and supporting features like coding projects, movie making, concept mapping, games, and primary source activities. Recommended for upper elementary and middle schoolers.
If your school has been closed due to the spread of COVID-19, head here to apply for FREE access to BrainPOP:¬†https://brnpop.co/2wZraB8 This will grant you the ability to assign student work and more!¬†‚Äç
For home use, families can register here:¬†https://brnpop.co/39Td0QS¬†
¬†¬†
¬†

BrainPOP‚Äôs K-3 resource, offering cross-curricular movies and supporting features like coding projects, movie making, concept mapping, games, and primary source activities.
If your school has been closed due to the spread of COVID-19, head here to apply for FREE access to BrainPOP:¬†https://brnpop.co/2wZraB8 This will grant you the ability to assign student work and more!¬†‚Äç
For home use, families can register here:¬†https://brnpop.co/39Td0QS¬†
¬†

CommonLit is a free online reading program for students in grades 3-12. Students can access high-interest informational and literary texts, standards-aligned assessments, and more.
¬†
¬†

Khan Academy is an online resource offering practice exercises, instructional videos, and a personalized learning dashboard that empower learners to study at their own pace in and outside of the classroom. Students can practice math, science, computer programming, history, art history, economics, and more. Khan Academy‚Äôs math missions can guide learners from kindergarten to calculus using state-of-the-art, adaptive technology that identifies strengths and learning gaps.
¬†
¬†

LearnZillion is the platform for accessing EL Education (K-2) ELA and Guidebooks (3-8).¬†LearnZillion provides a library of interactive language arts lessons, videos, quizzes, and assignments for students. LearnZillion tracks student progress and achievement on the lessons and quizzes and reports the results to the teacher‚Äôs dashboard for assessment.
¬†
Login Link: https://learnzillion.com/resources/73932

MackinVIA‚Ñ¢ is a program that provides access for students and teachers to their school‚Äôs digital library. MackinVIA can be accessed on any desktop, laptop, or mobile device with Internet access. Download titles to read offline, using the free MackinVIA app available for all major mobile devices.
¬†
¬†

Newsela publishes daily content to support instruction for ELA, Social Studies, Science, and even Social-Emotional Learning. Every article comes in 5 reading levels, tailored to the skill level of each reader. Assessments are integrated directly into articles to help students engage with the content and to give teachers and administrators actionable insights on students‚Äô reading activity.

NoRedInk provides students with opportunities to practice their grammar and writing skills through various interactive activities.¬†
¬†
¬†
Pearson Realize provides students with digital access to myPerspectives, the Tier I ELA Curriculum for Grades 6-12.

Scholastic at Home provides four learning experiences centered around a story or video.¬†
¬†
¬†

Studies Weekly is an online platform available to all teachers and students in K-5 featuring Social Studies content. Students use the platform to delve deeper into history through 100K+ primary source images and videos. Students can also access specialized tools such as an audio reader, highlighting tools and a rewards system.
¬†
¬†

Zearn is an online math curriculum for grades one¬†through five, with supplemental skills practice activities for kindergartners. Students have access to a dashboard with tasks to be completed; these include a variety of fluency warm-ups that promote general number sense and lesson-specific skills.
¬†
Login Link:¬†https://www.zearn.org/

li.a: Virtual Learning for Students with/without Significant Disabilities

p.style: color: #515151; font-size: 14px; font-family: Montserrat; text-align: left; padding: 0px; margin: 0px

div.p: Materials and lessons that are standards- based:

ol.li: Each grade level¬†(Pre-K, Elementary, Middle, and High) have a folder to access.
In each grade level, folders for ELA, Math, Science, Social Studies, and Transition/ Life Skills lessons) are available.
Each course will have lessons and activities that can be done for March and April.
Parents may be able to print the materials. ¬†Scroll the document towards the middle to see the actual content of the lesson.

a.strong: Center of parent information and resources

p.style: color: #515151; font-size: 14px; font-family: Montserrat; text-align: left; padding: 0px; margin: 0px

li.a: Virtual Learning for ESS Students needing additional curriculum support

p.style: color: #515151; font-size: 14px; font-family: Montserrat; text-align: left; padding: 0px; margin: 0px

div.p: ‚ÄúESS Students Needing Additional Support.‚Äù¬† This folder provides you with additional websites that will help facilities different learning strategies in the areas of reading, math, and language:

p.style: color: #515151; font-size: 14px; font-family: Montserrat; text-align: left; padding: 0px; margin: 0px
p.a: Enrichment Instructional Resources for ESS Students PDF Document

p.style: color: #515151; font-size: 14px; font-family: Montserrat; text-align: left; padding: 0px; margin: 0px
p.em: *To access resources, click directly on the green text.

ul.li:
To help families stay engaged in learning throughout a school closure. FASTalk is offering a new, direct-to-parents texting program free-of-charge for current partners:
‚Ä¢ FASTalk will send parents weekly tips and activities aligned to state ELA learning standards across preschool through fifth grade.
‚Ä¢ Activities will be sent by text message. Parents do not need to have a smartphone or download an app to benefit.
‚Ä¢ Text messages will be available in 100+ languages.
‚Ä¢ Parents will also receive tips to support social and emotional learning, including managing stress and anxiety.
‚Ä¢ FASTalk can also send links to high-quality online learning resources recommended by your district or state department of education. (Note: Districts interested in customizing the linked learning resources may contact support@fastalk.org to direct families to recommended resources.)

p.style: color: #515151; font-size: 14px; font-family: Montserrat; text-align: left; padding: 0px; margin: 0px

ul.li: offering free services for K12 ‚Äî this in¬†everything from guided¬†meditations, morning rituals, on-line counseling, and other mental health supports.

p.style: color: #515151; font-size: 14px; font-family: Montserrat; text-align: left; padding: 0px; margin: 0px
